main event: A student reported a UFO sighting of a white object on May 31, 1956, at Queens College in Flushing, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as being half the size of a commercial airliner,The object was observed for 5-10 minutes,The sighting included the object following and eventually passing a commercial airliner at high speed,Various conclusions were drawn about the object, including it possibly being a balloon or an unconventional craft,There were no photographs included in the report.
sighted object: one white object traveling at great speed
